thread.title: Celebrity Trainer and Lifestyle Coach Basheerah Ahmad Brings Fitness Flare to OWNZONES
thread.title_full: Celebrity Trainer and Lifestyle Coach Basheerah Ahmad Brings Fitness Flare to OWNZONES

author: admin
title: Celebrity Trainer and Lifestyle Coach Basheerah Ahmad Brings Fitness Flare to OWNZONES
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/11/2015 @ 6:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: OwnZones 
LOS ANGELES, Sept. 11, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Celebrity trainer and lifestyle coach Basheerah Ahmad joins the OWNZONES Media Network as it continues to expand its library of premium, ad-free content. The partnership brings Basheerah's unique 360 Transformation (360T) fitness program to OWNZONES, with quick at-home workouts designed to help subscribers reach their fitness goals without ever stepping foot in a gym. 
A highly sought-after celebrity trainer, Ahmad has sculpted the bodies of A-list stars like Carrie Underwood, Vivica A. Fox and Jordin Sparks. As both a trainer and lifestyle coach, Ahmad believes having a positive attitude is the key to success in any endeavor - fitness or otherwise. 
As a premium content provider, Ahmad will join many distinguished personalities on OWNZONES, such as celebrity stylist Ali Levine, and Food Network chef and author Aarti Sequeira. 
About OWNZONES Available online, across all devices and via Google Chromecast, OWNZONES is a content aggregation service that is changing how consumers discover, access, collect and subscribe to digital content. With OWNZONES, users can enjoy all of their text, audio and visual content in one advertising-free space. OWNZONES partners with iconic news agencies such as Reuters and The Guardian, while simultaneously tapping into niche providers like CineSport, The Motley Fool and What's Trending as well as popular personalities like Aarti Sequeira, Obi Obadike, Jennifer Adams. By providing unbundled access, OWNZONES gives users the freedom to build their own collection of content. 
About Basheerah Ahmad Celebrity fitness expert Basheerah Ahmad (MS, MHR, CPT) understands what it takes to impact the lives of others and currently works with and trains A-list celebrities such as Carrie Underwood, Vivica A. Fox and Jordin Sparks. In 1996, she held the coveted title of Miss Black America, and spent her reigning year traveling the country promoting healthy living through the arts. A year later, Basheerah graduated from the University of Oklahoma, with honors, earning a Bachelor's Degree in Business Management and in 2001, a Master's Degree in Organizational Development. From 1998 to 2001, she helped create several groundbreaking youth performing arts programs in the state of Oklahoma. In addition to helping youth find their voices through performing arts, Basheerah also worked for years as a Youth Mentor, Drug and Alcohol Preventionist, and Sex Education facilitator in the non-profit arena.
